conbody.p: TestOps homepage is a quick way to see your Organizations, Projects and their details.

li.p: Organization: You can see the list of all Organizations you belong to.
Select an Organization (e.g., Katalon) to see its details.
You can update your Organization name, manage Teams and Users if youâ€™re the Owner or Admin of your Organization.
Project: You can view the most recent Projects managed by the Team you belong to.
Select a Project to view its details and to start working on it.
